## Learning Outcomes

1. Describe data structures and algorithms and their inherent trade-offs.
2. Solve problems using data structures and algorithms.
3. Characterize the performance of data structures and algorithms with empirical methods.
4. Use IDEs, version control, test suites, and other industry standard tools.
5. Document code in markdown.
